name: Norwood Systems
tag_list: wireless, mobile, fixed-mobile-convergence, international-roaming, enterprise, service, saas, wi-fi
overview:
Norwood Systems is the developer of a revolutionary new service that allows large corporations to reduce their international roaming expenses.

Its core service offering, Voice Continuity™, is a simple and cost-effective offering that reduces costs and improves contactability for employees when they travel internationally to remote office locations.

Compatible with any SIM, Voice Continuity™ leverages a company’s investment in its PBX and voice WAN network to dramatically reduce costs of calling for business travellers, and importantly, optimise inbound call charges from other employees without requiring a change in their user behaviour.

Voice Continuity is based upon $15 million of previously invested R&D, using the code-base developed by the previous incarnation of Norwood Systems.

The Company was re-capitalised by its founder in February 2011. It closed a Series AA seed round in March 2012 and a follow on Series AA (2) round in December 2012.

milestones.description: Norwood Systems is delighted to announce the first public release of its private network roaming platform, Voice Continuity. The release follows several months of intensive testing, internally and with key technology partners.
milestones.source_description: Norwood Systems issues its first public release of Voice Continuity™

milestones.description: Norwood Systems is delighted to announce that it has closed an  angel-led seed round, accessing $1 million in additional funding.

external_links.title: Norwood Systems bursts onto the wireless tech scene
One phone for home, work and in between
